titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that remarriage of the surviving spouse of a veteran after age 55 shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Compensation, Pension, Insurance, and Memorial Affairs
committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs

bill.summary: 1/11/1995--Introduced. Provides that the remarriage of a veteran's spouse after age 55 shall not result in termination of dependency and indemnity compensation.
